Control Name: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures—The entity creates and maintains a record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.

control_attributes.Control: Creates and Retains Record of Detected or Reported Unauthorized Disclosures—The entity creates and maintains a record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures of personal information that is complete, accurate, and timely.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P6.3 The entity creates and retains a complete, accurate, and timely record of detected or reported unauthorized disclosures (including breaches) of personal information to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
